subject: Figure Skating
Ice Skating
lead_paragraph: Brian Joubert of France won the Grand Prix Final on Saturday by reeling off one quad and seven triple jumps, while the United States national champion, Johnny Weir, withdrew because of a hip injury.
snippet: Brian Joubert of France won the Grand Prix Final on Saturday by reeling off one quad and seven triple jumps, while the United States national champion, Johnny Weir, withdrew because of a hip injury.
